preference.name: AWC_visStdViewOrientationTop
preference.preference_description: Specifies the camera orientation for the Top view for the Viewer in the Active Workspace client. Bottom's camera orientation value will be set opposite of Top. Valid values are: * +x : Sets the Top view orientation to +x * +y : Sets the Top view orientation to +y * +z : Sets the Top view orientation to +z * -x : Sets the Top view orientation to -x * -y : Sets the Top view orientation to -y * -z : Sets the Top view orientation to -z. This is the default value.
